naslov: PRODAJA - VILA 240m2 S BAZENOM - 20m OD PLAŽE - CESARICA (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: PRODAJA - VILA 240m2 - CESARICA 20m OD PLAŽE! Prodajemo kompletno namještenu vilu prvi red do mora u parku prirode Sjeverni Velebit. Vila je smještena 20m od plaže, u mjestu Cesarica, 6min vožnje od Karlobaga. Izgrađena je 2010.g a kompletno renovirana 2020.g.(nova fasada i izolacija, nova keramika u kući, na terasama, okućnici, sunčalištu, novo razvedena struja i voda, nova stolarija s griljama). Vila se sastoji od prizemlja i kata ukupne površine 200m2. Vila ima dnevni boravak s kuhinjom i blagovaonicom, 4 spavaće sobe, 2 kupaonice, odvojen vešeraj i konobu. Također ima izlaz na 2 prostrane terase s pogledom na more i otok Pag. U dvorištu vile nalazi se bazen na elektrolizu (slana voda), hidromasaža i prostrano sunčalište, prostor za roštilj s velikom terasom te zatvorena bazenska kotlovnica. Vila je opremljena s dvije ugradbene kuhinje, boxspring hotelskim krevetima, smart led televizorima i klima uređajima u svim prostorijama. U sklopu vile je i manji apartman ukupne površine od 40m2 koji se sastoji od dnevnog boravka s blagovanicom i kuhinje, kupaonice i spavaće sobe. Apartmanu također pripada i prostrana terasa te ima zaseban ulaz. Vila ima 2 ulaza, jedan sa strane mora a jedan sa strane magistrale. Ispred vile nalaze se 3 vanjska parkirna mjesta. Vlasništvo 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar SALE - VILLA 240m2 - CESARICA 20m FROM THE BEACH! We are selling a fully furnished villa, first row to the sea in the Northern Velebit nature park. The villa is located 20m from the beach, in Cesarica, 6 minutes drive from Karlobag. It was built in 2010 and completely renovated in 2020 (new facade and insulation, new ceramics in the house, on the terraces, garden, sunbathing area, newly separated electricity and water, new carpentry with shutters). The villa consists of a ground floor and a first floor with a total area of ​​200m2. The villa has a living room with a kitchen and dining room, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a separate laundry room and a tavern. It also has access to 2 spacious terraces with a view of the sea and the island of Pag. In the yard of the villa there is an electrolysis pool (salt water), a hydromassage and a spacious sunbathing area, a barbecue area with a large terrace and a closed pool boiler room. The villa is equipped with two built-in kitchens, box spring hotel beds, smart led TVs and air conditioners in all rooms. Within the villa there is also a smaller apartment with a total area of ​​40m2, which consists of a living room with a dining room and a kitchen, a bathroom and bedroom. The apartment also has a spacious terrace and a separate entrance. The villa has 2 entrances, one from the sea side and one from the street side. There are 3 outdoor parking spaces in front of the villa. Ownership 1/1 ! Bonus nekretnine d.o.o. Osredak 4, Zagreb Zadar
